cab.content: kef:------^"yFrom Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, // I f J19th May 1917. ' / ^(Repeated to Resident, Aden.)Foreign Secret. Arab Confederacy. I presume your telegram of ^ / Nl^fth: May was repeated to Resident, Aden, and that latter will telegraph /Q & fprtlier after consideration of vour views. Your telegram crossed mine of / / X^;Mav.V
